tool.name: qiime2 diversity-lib faith-pd

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency | RelativeFrequency | PresenceAbsence]
param.help: [required] The feature table containing the samples for which Faith's phylogenetic diversity should be computed. Table values will be converted to presence/absence.

param.name: phylogeny
param.label: phylogeny: Phylogeny[Rooted]
param.help: [required] Phylogenetic tree containing tip identifiers that correspond to the feature identifiers in the table. This tree can contain tip ids that are not present in the table, but all feature ids in the table must be present in this tree.

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: threads: Int % Range(1, None) | Str % Choices('auto')
param.help: [default: 1] The number of CPU threads to use in performing this calculation. May not exceed the number of available physical cores. If threads = 'auto', one thread will be created for each identified CPU core on the host.

param.name: threads
param.label: threads: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 1] The number of CPU threads to use in performing this calculation. May not exceed the number of available physical cores. If threads = 'auto', one thread will be created for each identified CPU core on the host.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity-lib faith-pd =============================== Faith's Phylogenetic Diversity
Outputs: -------- :vector.qza: Vector containing per-sample values for Faith's Phylogenetic Diversity.
|
Description: ------------ Computes Faith's Phylogenetic Diversity for all samples in a feature table.
|

citations.citation: @article{cite1, author = {Faith, Daniel P}, doi = {10.1016/0006-3207(92)91201-3}, journal = {Biological conservation}, number = {1}, pages = {1--10}, publisher = {Elsevier}, title = {Conservation evaluation and phylogenetic diversity}, volume = {61}, year = {1992} }
